means: 单音节词( monosyllable的名词复数 )

sentence.Network_en: A taciturn man, he replied to my questions in monosyllables.
sentence.Network_cn: 他寡言少语，回答我的问题时只是往外蹦单字。

sentence.Network_en: He was a wooden - faced individual , extremely taciturn, and his contributions to the conversation were mostly monosyllables.
sentence.Network_cn: 他有一张非常独特的木纳的脸, 极其的沉默, 他说话时吐出来的总是一个一个的单音节.

PerfectNetExp.abs: monosulfuron 除草剂, monosyllables 单音词, monosyllabic 中古汉语

list.abs: 单音节(monosyllable)字在1930年左右仍属于禁忌， 而今在许多有教养的人或富有的都市妇女之间，以使用这种话作为有率直性、世 …
...stress)。 英语单词按其所含音节的多少可分为单音节词 （monosyllables），双音节词 (disyllables)，三音节词(trisyllables)，和多音.

entry.tran: 少言寡语(通常因不愿交谈)
entry.def: If you say that someone speaks in monosyllables you mean that they speak very little, usually because they do not want to have a conversation.

example.ex: A taciturn man, he replied to my questions in monosyllables.
example.tran: 他不爱说话，对我的问题一两个字就打发掉了。

auth_sentence.content: A comprehensive lexicon of all the multi-purpose monosyllables used by headline-writers.
